text: The best pizza and excellent service! All the employees were so kind and helpful! Good prices and fast service.

name: Marcy Young
text: Forgot the salad so the driver went back to get it, no big deal. Then I realized that all the dipping sauce was missing too so I called and the person who answered said we already sent the driver out with your food...he'll be there in 10 or 15 minutes....no apologies or anything!

text: This is far more a better place to eat when you want quick pizza because the drivers are friendly and quick on the deliveries and their ranch crust is awesome!

text: I love this hungry Howie's location they're always prompt on their deliveries everything's always right they always have friendly drivers as well. I downloaded the app a few months ago and I've used it a few times over the past month or so â€¦More

text: Not sure if it was a fluke or not but the two pizzas we got honestly looked and tasted like a pizza hut pie lol weird to say but I swear. There was hardly any toppings and it was a lot of bread. We ate it though so cant complain too much

text: The food was good, I had a deep dish pizza which was more like a pan pizza. The staff was really friendly when I walked in and the store was very clean. I would definitely order from here again.

text: Love it! Highly recommended. Try the antipasto salad.

name: nick G
text: Little hap hazard place but they got the job done and quick. Price it worth the trip. Thanks for the service. Tire looks to have 80% tread left. For 25 bucks no complaints here. Will come back.

name: Michael Murray

name: Geoff Weaver
text: I ordered online only to receive a call saying we were out of their delivery range. They refunded the delivery fee as I chose to pick up the order rather than cancel. The buffalo chicken pizza was very tasty but also very salty. I would order again but only if I was going to be driving past.

name: Dezi Hunter

text: I've always enjoyed the food from Hungry Howie's. However, ordering from this one hasn't exactly been a par for the course. Forgotten items more than half of the time I have ordered. I can understand once or twice when busy, but not this â€¦More
